title: Fragments have a different view lifecycle than activities. When binding a fragment in onCreateView, set the views to null in onDestroyView. Butter Knife returns an Unbinder instance when you call bind to do this for you. Call its unbind method in the appropriate lifecycle callback.

inline_content.Text: Fragments have a different view lifecycle than activities. When binding a fragment in onCreateView, set the views to null in onDestroyView. Butter Knife returns an Unbinder instance when you call bind to do this for you. Call its unbind method in the appropriate lifecycle callback.

title: Note: Calling unbind() in onDestroyView() is not required, but recommended as it saves quite a bit of memory if your app has a large backstack.

inline_content.Text: Note: Calling unbind() in onDestroyView() is not required, but recommended as it saves quite a bit of memory if your app has a large backstack.
